sentence: Republican Members have many constituents who are on Medicaid  and Medicare and who receive SNAP benefits.

Speaker, food costs are sky high, and millions of  people across the country are losing their SNAP benefits due to Trump's  big, ugly bill, which made the largest cut to food assistance and  healthcare in American history.
They insist moms and kids won't lose food assistance, but this bill  will cut SNAP benefits for over 7 million Americans, stripping food  from families' tables.
The next moment, the  President says he will only send out SNAP benefits when the government  reopens.

We are  talking about nutrition and taking away SNAP benefits from families and  so much more, because the budget they voted for called for $880 billion  in cuts to Medicaid and $230 billion in cuts to SNAP.
He spoke about  the record-breaking number of people coming to the food pantry every  month, especially when USDA let SNAP benefits lapse during the  Republican shutdown.
Monica was hospitalized, fighting for her life, when she learned that  her $31 a week in SNAP benefits were being cut.
Now is not the time to raise grocery costs for families  and force states to choose between taking SNAP benefits away from large  numbers of people or ending their SNAP programs entirely.

The bill cuts SNAP benefits by 20 percent for all  participants, or roughly $200 billion, jeopardizing SNAP benefits for  more than 40 million people, including 16 million children and 8  million seniors who rely on this for nutritional assistance.

Court of Appeals for the First  Circuit, this administration will argue that SNAP benefits should be  ended after the President himself promised that they would be paid in  full in compliance with the district court orders in Rhode Island and  Massachusetts.
They will pay for it by making cuts to  Medicaid to the tune of $880 billion and deep cuts to SNAP benefits,  food assistance to families.
For me, what that district looks like is about one in four households  rely on SNAP benefits.

When you had a Colombian woman unlawfully residing in Boston who was  convicted 2 days ago, following a 5-day jury trial in Federal court, of  identity theft offenses, including receiving rental assistance, Social  Security, and SNAP benefits, as well as voter fraud under stolen  identity, voting in several Federal elections, including the 2024  Presidential election, this is a real problem in Massachusetts right  now.

The Department of Labor and the Department of Agriculture are working  to make sure that illegal immigrants are not receiving Federal benefits  that they are not authorized to receive, such as unemployment insurance  or SNAP benefits, otherwise known as food stamps.

Millions of Americans have suffered because Democrats have refused to  reopen the government, harming those who depend on SNAP benefits,  Federal workers, Border Patrol agents, and our troops, who were  uncertain about their next paycheck.
It fully  funds SNAP benefits until September 30 of next year.
SNAP benefits are being  funded.
Lapses in Federal funding have made it harder for families to access  SNAP benefits, Head Start Programs have been put on pause, and  thousands of Federal employees are unable to receive a paycheck.
It strengthens SNAP benefits.

President, SNAP benefits have been in the news  and a topic of much discussion, and those benefits for over 40 million  Americans lapsed over the weekend because the Democrats have chosen to  hold government funding hostage for political ``leverage''--their  word--at the American people's expense.
